video.title: So Awkward
video.synopsis: Book smart but socially ill at ease, three 13-year-old girls have trouble relating to their peers as well as their parents.

episodes.synopsis: To get noticed by her workaholic mother, Martha stirs up trouble at school with Jas's help, while Lily conspires with Ollie to outsmart her nosy mom.
episodes.title: Parentology

episodes.synopsis: On "Wear Your Own Clothes Day," Lily teams up with cool girl Natasha to avoid looking like a dork in Jas's homemade outfits.
episodes.title: Friendundancy

episodes.synopsis: Upset about getting an A- on her history test, Martha begins studying madly, causing a worried Mrs. Griggs to assign Matt to be Martha's "fun" tutor.
episodes.title: A Minus

episodes.synopsis: When Martha reveals she has an extra ticket to a science talk hosted by the hunky Dr. Nox, Lily, Jas and Mrs. Griggs vie to be the lucky recipient.
episodes.title: The Nox Factor

episodes.synopsis: While she and Jas nurse colds at Jas's house, Martha starts to clean maniacally and washes Jas's beloved teddy bear, upsetting both Jas and her dad.
episodes.title: Mr. Sicky Bear

episodes.synopsis: Lily frets that she and Matt might not be compatible, so Jas adapts a plant species comparison program to assess humans, with curious results.
episodes.title: Love Machine

episodes.synopsis: Martha wins her campaign for a new library, but she and Jas are soon at odds when Jas learns that her favorite tree will have to be cut down.
episodes.title: Library vs Tree

episodes.synopsis: Lily is upset to learn that Matt is dating a cool girl, so Jas plans a makeover slumber party for her but runs into scheduling conflicts with Martha.
episodes.title: Space Over

episodes.synopsis: When a guidance counselor suggests she may not have the right stuff for a career in law, Martha vows to prove her wrong by lobbying the school board.
episodes.title: Fitzgerald vs Fitzgerald

episodes.synopsis: At a National Young Inventors competition, Lily and Martha have a falling out when Lily joins Matt's team and Martha adds cool, cute Roxy to her team.
episodes.title: Rox My World

episodes.synopsis: Having lost her uniform tie, Lily panics and steals one, but soon regrets her actions. Returning the tie to its owner, however, proves complicated.
episodes.title: Good Girls

episodes.synopsis: To avoid a scolding for losing her library books, Lily casts blame on an imaginary classmate. With Jas's help, the lie takes on a life of its own.
episodes.title: Everybody Loves Clementine

episodes.synopsis: To impress her crush, Jas volunteers herself and her friends for his charity basketball tournament, even though none of them are into sports.
episodes.title: Pouncing Tigers
